name: Rituel of the Jam
description:
Game Jam de Québec 10 octobre 2022:

RITUEL of the Jam

A small game done in 48 hours for th GameJam de Quebec.

Team members : Michael Leblanc, Thomas Bérubé, Jean-René Vigneault, Anthony Guay , André-Paul Grenon.

Credits for the asset pack : https://analogstudios.itch.io/
